title: Pharmacy Vaccinations
description: Renown Pharmacy provides vaccinations by appointment for several common vaccine types.
cleaned_text: Pharmacy Vaccinations by AppointmentThe Renown Pharmacy team can order additional vaccines with advanced notice. Please call [775-982-7737](tel:775-982-7737)before scheduling to check on availability. Renown Pharmacy provides vaccinations by appointment for the following: - COVID-19 Bivalent vaccine (Pfizer-BioNTech) - Hepatitis B vaccine (HEPLISAV-B) - Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine (Gardasil 9) - Influenza/Flu vaccine (High dose for 65+ and standard dose for those six months to 64 years) - Measles, Mumps, Rubella Monkeypox (JYNNEOS) - Shingles vaccine (Shingrix) - Pneumonia vaccine (Pneumovax23 and Prevnar 20) - Tetanus, provided though the tetanus, diphtheria and pertussis (Tdap) booster (Adacel) [MyChart](https://mychart.renown.org/mychart/Authentication/Login?) Frequently Asked Questions - Can I refill my prescriptions online?Renown Pharmacy specializes in hard-to-find pharmaceuticals at lower costs not typically stocked at other retail locations, such as certain compound medications. If you complete the secure Pharmacy Rx Mail Order form, you will receive your medications in the mail. - How can I refill a prescription at a different pharmacy? You can transfer your prescriptions by calling one of our pharmacy locations and allowing our expert pharmacy staff to complete the process for you. Renown Pharmacy Pringle: [775-982-7737](tel:775-982-7737) Renown Pharmacy Locust: [775-982-5280](tel:775-982-5280) - Can I save at the Renown Pharmacy? [Hometown Health](https://www.hometownhealth.com/)and [Senior Care Plus](https://www.seniorcareplus.com/)members enjoy a reduced copay and can save money on mail-order prescriptions. For example, members can pay two 30-day copays instead of three 30-day copays for a 90-day supply. If you're interested in exploring insurance options, get in touch! MyChart Pharmacy ServicesMyChart Pharmacy Services are now available in your MyChart portal! Select the top left menu icon and access the Schedule an Appointment link. Login to MyChart to: - Request a refill - Check prescription status - Schedule a vaccine appointment
